name: nun
desc: nun do not afraid of light, try avoid her and find doors to running away!

name: horribleman
desc: This strange man only show when you find out all the other enemies, try find him 3 times!

name: snowman
desc: snowman will summon enemies standing adjacent, and you need to use light on him for 3 times

name: grinch
desc: meet grinch, lose 1 hp and lose all gifts

name: Ice Ground
desc: reveal a safe card in neighbour

name: sign
desc: arrow to show which direction is the bell
(only when there is at least one grinch unrevealed) Add fog on 2x2 area. There must be a grinch in this area, and you can't use light on this area.
